translations: 在社交网站 Twitter 上发微博（tweet 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: When young people are critical of an over-tweeting president, they reveal a mental discipline in thinking skills—and in their choices on when to share on social media.
sentences.translation: 当年轻人批评一位过度发推特的总统时，他们在思维技能以及选择何时在社交媒体分享方面展现出一种精神自律。

sentences.sentence: So when young people are critical of an over-tweeting president, they reveal a mental discipline in thinking skills and in their choices on when to share on social media.
sentences.translation: 所以当年轻人指责总统过多使用 Twitter 的时候，他们在思维方式上以及选择何时在社交媒体上分享的方面表现出了一种精神自律。

sentences.sentence: Publishing extensions is as easy as tweeting a message.
sentences.translation: 发布扩展就像在推特上发布一条消息一样简单。
